item.title: Some notes on Convolution Course
item.description: Some notes on Convolution course What is padding? Padding is to add some pixels to the border of the original image, such as a 6*6 image will become a 8*8 image if we add a pixel to its border. Why is filters always odd? valid convolution vs same convolution. valid convolution is on padding that means the actual pixels of the output image after we convole original image with filter.

item.title: My Little Baby
item.description: My Little Baby My wife and I went to hostipal because she felt pain in womb on 6 May. The doctor advised hostipalization for her. She felt pain frequenctly that night. Doctors gave her a anesthetic that make her felt less pain. She was ready to give birth a baby on the next day morning. I was waiting beside the door of delivery room. After two hours, a nurse opened the door and told me that my wife had given birth to a baby successfully.

item.title: 英语发音-连读和节奏
item.description: 英语发音-连读和节奏 一、连读 连读指在同个意群里，前一个辅音音素结尾，后一个单词以元音音素开头，把它们连起来读。 连读本质是用更短的时间传达信息

item.title: Echo set color
item.description: Echo set color 先看例子：echo -e "\033[32m Hello world \033[0m" 会输出 $echo -e "\033[32m Hello world \033[0m" Hello world # 绿色的文字 其中： -e表示解析逃逸字符（Escape character），逃逸字符为
